item.description:
Meeting Format

1. Introductions (15 mins)

3. Moderated discussion on specific topic (1 hour).

4. Announcements, opportunities, connections (10 mins)

5.. Exchange business cards/social networking. (15 mins)


This will be a moderated discussion on building and launching a successful marketing campaign for your organization. We will discuss goals, budget, desired outcomes and how they parlay into a variety of potential collateral choices in building a campaign. Included will be discussion on the use of ingenuity in "selling" your organization or product via traditional paper media, internet, advertising, communications media, DVD's/CD's, and virtual media.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the room 15 minutes early. You'll recognize me from my photo!
item.why: Great people, opportunity to network, learn and share from a dynamic group of nonprofit professionals.
item.name: Marketing Strategy: A look at building a goal-driven campaign
